name: Recipe: Konda Cuisine
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Konda Cuisine.

value.name: Fowl
value.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

value.name: Snapdragon
value.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

value.name: Lavender Melon
value.desc: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

value.name: Mushroom
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Konda Cuisine
value.desc: Slowly stewed local cuisine. Everyone in Konda Village knows how to make this dish. It originally had no name but would spread throughout Inazuma on account of its nutritious deliciousness. This eventually caused those from outside the village to give it its name â€” "Konda Cuisine."

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Reward from reaching Reputation Level 1 in Inazuma</color>
